Author: 21 May 2015
Review_Url: When I saw this film for the first time I was a little boy exploring Disney and Pixar films. I loved "Finding Nemo" because there are no angry, jealous, greedy, or murderous villains as in most traditional Disney animated films. It was just an animation film that used to make me feel a little bit excited. The story is useful for children who thinks that they can do whatever they want without taking consequences. I think we should compare this kind of children with Nemo. And the parents of these children should be compared with Nemo's father because of all the protection that normal families have with their kids. "Finding Nemo" can be a motivation film too. Nemo has a physical disability and he tries to prove that it is not a problem for himself. I think "Finding Nemo" could be a motivation for children who has physical disabilities too.

Author: 30 September 2014
Review_Url: Finding Nemo is Pixar's greatest movie to date. Everything in the movie is meticulously chosen to add to the atmosphere and send a great message to the viewer. This movie has been out for over ten years and people still recognize all of the characters from it instantly, showing how memorable the movie really was. This movie was one of the first animated films that really wowed people in terms of scope and execution since the first animated Disney films. The key factors that made finding Nemo an instant classic were the brilliantly chosen voice actors, and the atmosphere that the movie was able to bring to the ocean.

Author: 11 June 2015

And if you guys are worried it is absolutely 100% child approved! I also like this film a lot because the personalities of the characters in this film are a lot like the personalities that people we know have! It is a pretty good movie just to sit back laugh, and enjoy what's happening on the screen without having to stay on high-alert for something scary that the children won't like! Again I completely recommend this film for something that a family could watch together!

Author: 15 October 2015
Review_Url: "Finding Nemo" is a movie about a family of fish that are living their lives in the ocean escaping danger. These fish are mostly safe from everything around them as long as they are cautious, but sometimes that open ocean is an extremely dangerous place from these fish. Especially for Nemo considering the fact that he is a kid and still has a lot to learn about surviving in the ocean. Nemo goes to school and disregards his dad's rules. He is supposed to stick with his class and stay away from the open ocean. Though Nemo with his curiosity doesn't listen to his dad and ends up getting himself into trouble. Nemo finds himself on a fishing ship and ends up in an aquarium with a bunch of other captured fish. His dad goes on a quest to find Nemo while Nemo tries to escape.

Author: 16 January 2017
Review_Url: Great characters, amusing animation, and laugh-out-loud humor. Also, watch for the little skit shown after the credits. www.sineemo.com It's all great stuff that simply must be seen.

Author: 19 April 2017
Review_Url: It's all about love between older generation and younger generation. This animation reflects today's younger generations' behavior. Even though, it is all about the animals, you may also regard as human beings. Everyone should watch this little cute animation. Don't waste your time by reading my review, just watch it.

Author: 28 July 2017
Review_Url: I absolutely love Finding Nemo! One of the best animated movies i've seen. The theme of trust is very good. I like that marlin really has to learn to trust not just nemo but the world around him as well. I love how they made the ocean look so real for an animated movie as well. Very realistic. I feel all the actors did an amazing job but my favorite was Ellen.Her Dory was great.All of the characters were great to be honest. I loved them all. Another of my favorites was Mr.Ray. He wasn't around a lot but when he was he was a great presence on the screen. The dentist was hilarious as well as the tank friends. I think Dory is my favorite character. There are so many good things about this movie yet I'm having a hard time naming them all. The way the story was told way very well done. It flowed nicely and fit together perfectly. Not once did something feel out of place from scene to scene.

Author: 2 September 2017
Review_Url: loved this movie watch it over and over. I loved "Finding Nemo" as a child and could not wait for them to make a sequel! so happy that it was as good as this one! watch this movie at least 20 times a year. I first watched this movie as a child in theater and it has been a favorite ever since. i hope others enjoy this movie as much as myself. great movie to show off a good TV if you have the blue ray version.

Author: 25 November 2005
Review: The best movie for a long time.
Review_Url: Finding Nemo is the best movie i have seen since The Lion King. I'm only young and even though my 7 year old sister thinks its a kids movie i think its for all ages. It includes lots of different lines, comments and music from a range of different movies and the humour in it is very humorous for 4 year old kids through to 4000 yr old people.Andrew Stanton has done an excellent job in directing this hit. Another thing i absolutely love about it is the casters didn't choose the popular celebrities but used people who i never knew before this. They gave the chance of being famous and well known to people who are usually just stuck behind the scenes of movies. They used a range of different fish that fit into different stereotypes in our communities and our own lives in the modern times. Finding Nemo as well as Shrek and Shrek 2 are some of the most awesome movies that have being put out in the last decade.

Author: 14 October 2017
Review: just as good as i remembered
Review_Url: i know that i'm super late to the party, but this is one of the handful of movies that i grew up watching. maybe i'm biased to Disney/pixar movies, but finding nemo is just one of those films i can keep coming back to. if i'm in a bad mood, i can pop the disc into the DVD player with a sweet tea and some popcorn and relax. am i the only one who feels this way?

Author: 10 December 2005
Review: finding Nemo was a great movie
Review_Url: Finding Nemo was a great movie that people of all ages can enjoy! I couldn't stop watching it! I watched every day for almost a month! This movie is one of my all time favorites! I think the graphics made the whole movie even more enjoyable. The plot line was smart,interesting and kept viewers on the edge of their seats. The characters were all well rounded and very believable as well as lovable. My favorite character was Dory, a forgetful fish who is always optimistic. I really enjoyed the sharks and turtles as well. In my opinion this movie is perfect and i wouldn't change a thing! Well I guess i would give myself a part but thats all. :D I strongly recommend those who haven't seen this movie to do so as soon as possible!

Author: 16 June 2018
Review_Url: My 4 year old son just loves this movie. He loves to watch your film over and over again. I just love how the fishes make friends and try to help each other. Nemo Dad keeps reminding him to be safe and other adult fishes remind the young fishes of the different dangers and to keep safe. They teach the kids if you lost someone to never give up hope and keep looking for them and one day you might be reconnected again someday. This is a excellent movie for all ages. Thanks for creating this film. My son and I just love your film. I saw this ounce in the theater. and watch it many times with my son at home.

Author: 8 January 2019
Review_Url: Finding Nemo is a wonderful animated adventure movie.i loved this film loved everything about its entertaining and funny
